channel.title: Beef on Chef Frank's Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Beef on Chef Frank's Recipes

item.title: Quick and Easy Chili Recipe For 200 People
item.description: Try this quick easy chili recipe for school kid’s lunch or a church function. Corn bread and shredded cheddar cheese along with a saladmake this a great meal and is very affordable as well. Here’s the chili recipe for those of you cooking for a crowd: Ingredients 56# chili beans(red) ( 7 no. 10 cans) 11 qts tomato juice 30# ground beef 6 large green peppers diced 4 large spanish onions diced 2 large stalks celery diced 1 c.

item.title: Summer Hot Dogs
item.description: There is nothing like a fine summer hot dog. some of the best recipes

item.title: Recipe Basics and Sauces
item.description: Welcome to the Recipe Basics Section of our site. Recipe Basics Partner and Link With Other Recipes on This Site. A Convenient and Quick way to Coordinate your Family Menu Plans. For Example, Maitre d’ Butter Goes with Sirloin Steak., Easy Basic Sauce Recipes, Easy Internal Links to the Roux Recipe, Egg Washfor your Fruit Pie Crusts so your Pie Crust is Flaky. Drawn Butter, for Fresh Seafood Recipes like Lobster Thermidorand Broiled Whitefishfrom Lake Michigan.

item.title: Easy Homemade Bread
item.description: Easy Homemade Bread Quick Easy Whole Wheat or White Bread Recipe is From Scratch, Makes Two Loaves, and is the same as Grandma Makes. Homemade Bread Aroma Welcomes Your Family and Guests Warmly. Homemade Bread Ingredients 6-7 c flour ( whole wheat or white) 3 level tbsp yeast paste, or dry yeast 2 tbsp sugar 1 tbsp honey 1 tbsp salt 1 c 2% milk 1 1/4 c water warm 95℉ 2 tsp butter Homemade Bread Directions In a large mixing bowl place warm water (95℉), then yeast and mix together.

item.title: Goulash With Ground Beef
item.description: Quick Easy Goulash Recipe with Fresh Ground Beef and Elbow Macaroni, Tomato Sauce and Fresh Cut Vegetables with Cheese. Goulash is a Great Casserole for Lunch or Supper. Goulash serves 8 1 lb macaroni, cooked 8 min., drained 1 lb ground beef, cooked, drained 1/2 onion, diced 1/2 green pepper, diced 1 can tomato sauce 1 can diced tomatoes 2 oz. melted butter 1 tsp Chef Frank’s Seasoning 1 tsp chili powder 1 c shredded cheddar cheese(optional) Combine all ingredients in large mixing bowl.

item.title: Holiday Prime Rib Roast with Au Jus
item.description: Celebrate the Holidays with our very special Prime Rib Roast recipe. It includes an awesome Au Jus recipe. Follow the links to festive side dishes too. Prime Rib Roast Ingredients 15-19 lb rib roast 1/4 c garlic, fresh chopped 1 tbsp Chef Frank’s Seasoning 2 c water Prime Rib Directions Place rib roast in large roasting pan, bone down, add water and seasonings. Cover and place in oven at 275* and roast for 5 hours then check with thermometer.
